faqs.question: What is Nebulyn?
faqs.answer: Nebulyn is an online platform that connects job seekers with employers offering full-time, part-time, freelance, and remote job opportunities across multiple industries.

faqs.question: What industries does Nebulyn cater to?
faqs.answer: Nebulyn supports a wide range of industries including IT, Marketing, Finance, Education, Design, Healthcare, Logistics, and more.

faqs.question: Does Nebulyn have a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes, Nebulyn offers a mobile app for both Android and iOS for convenient job search and application tracking.

faqs.question: How do I create a job seeker account?
faqs.answer: You can sign up using your email or phone number, verify your details, and then build your profile with educational background, skills, and resume.

faqs.question: Can I upload a video resume?
faqs.answer: Yes, Nebulyn supports video resumes which help you showcase your personality and communication skills to employers.

faqs.question: How do I apply for jobs?
faqs.answer: Search or browse jobs that suit your profile, click 'Apply', and follow the instructions. You can track all applications in your dashboard.

faqs.question: What do application statuses like 'Under Review' or 'Shortlisted' mean?
faqs.answer: 'Under Review' means your application is being evaluated. 'Shortlisted' means you're among the selected candidates for the next step.

faqs.question: Can I set job alerts?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can enable job alerts based on preferred roles, industries, or locations to receive instant notifications.

faqs.question: Does Nebulyn offer resume building tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide templates, expert tips, and AI-powered tools to help you create a professional resume.

faqs.question: Are there any assessments on Nebulyn?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can take skill-based assessments to improve your profile credibility and visibility to recruiters.

faqs.question: How do I post a job on Nebulyn?
faqs.answer: Create an employer account, choose a posting plan, fill in job details, and publish your job listing.

faqs.question: Can I edit or delete a job post after publishing?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can manage your listings from the dashboard including editing or removing job posts.

faqs.question: Can I directly contact applicants?
faqs.answer: Yes, employers can message candidates or schedule interviews via the built-in communication system.

faqs.question: What is included in premium job postings?
faqs.answer: Premium listings get increased visibility, targeted reach, featured placement, and access to more candidate insights.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and digital wallets for all transactions.

faqs.question: Can I get an invoice for my payment?
faqs.answer: Yes, invoices are automatically generated and sent to your registered email after successful transactions.

faqs.question: Is there a refund policy for employers?
faqs.answer: Yes, refunds are available in accordance with our refund policy. Please contact support for assistance.

faqs.question: How does Nebulyn verify job listings?
faqs.answer: All job postings go through a verification process. We also allow users to report suspicious or fraudulent listings.

faqs.question: Is user data safe on Nebulyn?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use encryption and strict privacy practices to ensure all personal and professional data is secure.

faqs.question: Can I report a scam or fake job?
faqs.answer: Yes, use the 'Report' button on the job listing or contact our support team with details.

faqs.question: How can I contact Nebulyn support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via live chat, email support@nebulyn.com, or through the Help Center on our platform.

faqs.question: When is customer support available?
faqs.answer: Our support team is available from 9 AM to 9 PM IST, Monday to Saturday.

faqs.question: Where can I give feedback about my experience?
faqs.answer: You can share feedback through the 'Rate Us' option in your account or write to us directly.

faqs.question: What should I do if my resume won't upload?
faqs.answer: Please ensure your file is in PDF or DOC format and under 5MB. If the issue persists, contact support.

faqs.question: I didn’t receive the OTP during signup. What now?
faqs.answer: Check your network, wait a few minutes, and try again. If still not received, use the 'Resend OTP' option or contact support.

faqs.question: How do I delete my Nebulyn account?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. Once deleted, your data will be permanently removed.

faqs.question: What is Nebulyn’s privacy policy?
faqs.answer: You can read our detailed privacy policy on the website. We are GDPR compliant and prioritize user data protection.

faqs.question: Can I leave a review for an employer?
faqs.answer: Yes, after your hiring process concludes, you can rate and review the employer from your dashboard.

faqs.question: Does Nebulyn offer career counseling?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide access to certified career coaches and periodic webinars to help job seekers grow professionally.

faqs.question: Are there internships or entry-level jobs on Nebulyn?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Nebulyn has a dedicated section for internships, fresher roles, and student opportunities.
